segments.text: Can you recognize that woman , Millie ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I can , Kate . It must be Karen Marsh , the actress .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought so . Who ’ s that beside her ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Conrad Reeves , the actor ? It can ’ t be . Let me have another look . I think you ’ re right ! Isn ’ t he her third husband ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , He must be her fourth or fifth .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Doesn ’ t Karen Marsh look old !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She does , doesn ’ t she ! I read she ’ s twenty-nine , but she must be at least forty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She was a famous actress when I was still a schoolgirl .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That was a long time ago , wasn ’ t it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not that long ago ! I ’ m not more than twenty-nine myself .
segments.speaker: S2
